LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_AtlantLauncher.label: grenade round
LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_CombatShotgun.label: solid slug
LanguageData.DMS_AtlantGrenadeLauncher.label: Atlant Grenade Launcher
LanguageData.DMS_AtlantGrenadeLauncher.description: A fully automatic grenade launcher designed for handheld use, highly lethal against soft targets concealed behind cover. However, due to the intense recoil from continuous firing, it is typically not used in full-auto mode.
LanguageData.DMS_KS23K.label: Tula combat shotgun
LanguageData.DMS_KS23K.description: A modernized large-caliber shotgun, fed by detachable box magazines to deliver sustained fire suppression. The metal slugs it uses are remarkably effective even against heavily armored targets.
LanguageData.DMS_KS23K.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_KS23K.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_KS23K.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Tula combat shotgun
LanguageData.DMS_PKM.label: Mikhail Machinegun
LanguageData.DMS_PKM.description: A lightweight machine gun utilizing a bullpup design, which can be effortlessly operated even by humans, providing prolonged and effective fire suppression against numerous lightly armored targets.
LanguageData.DMS_PKM.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_PKM.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_PKM.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mikhail Machinegun
LanguageData.DMS_YekaterinRifle.label: Yekaterin Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_YekaterinRifle.description: A bullpup anti-materiel rifle, designed to enable law enforcement units to neutralize heavy automatroid. Its structure is greatly simplified to ensure that even non-enhanced humans can carry and operate this rifle.
LanguageData.DMS_YekaterinRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_YekaterinRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
